questions.description: Bohumil passed away on June 12, 1950, five years after his retirement from Oklahoma A&M College.

questions.description: Georgia died on April 9, 1940, the same year Bohumil received his honorary doctorate from the University of Tulsa.

questions.description: Bohumil married Georgia Shestack on August 2, 1911, when he was 33 years old, after meeting her during a visit to his family in Nebraska.
